### FIRST OVER TIME
Calculates the earliest value of a field, where recency determined by the `@timestamp` field.

```esql
TS k8s
| STATS max_cost=MAX(FIRST_OVER_TIME(network.cost)) BY cluster, time_bucket = TBUCKET(1minute)
```
